title: The Unremembered Lands
description: Kidnapped by a dragon, with no rescuer in sight, Princess Mabelrose did what any courageous princess would do--she saved herself!Making her way back home, across the Unremembered Lands, Mabelrose discovers that her father, King Jeryk, while on a quest to find her has himself been captured by another, mightier dragon!Now Mabelrose, and a few stalwart companions must attempt to save her father . . . from the Dragon Queen!A captivating tale that demonstrates that neither gender, nor status, nor accident of birth is an obstacle if you have a courageous spirit, Rod Espinosa's enchanting trilogy is being made available in paperback for the first time.Volume 2 of 3.
author: Rod Espinosa
